resources.string: A F1Tv/F1TvPro account is required to login

Sometimes this might happen even if your login and password are correct due a F1 API BUG.

 1. If that is the case a possible workaround is to go to F1TV website on your computer, then login on your account and logout then come back to the app and it will eventually work.
 2. It is also possible that for some reason your IP is blocked (401 response) in this case try to switch networks it might also work.
